sentence.Network_en: He was endlessly kind and patient with children.
sentence.Network_cn: 他对孩子们总是非常好，很有耐心。

sentence.Network_cn: 他们就甜菜和牛饲料的话题谈个没完.

entry.tran: 无止境的;无边无际的;无休止的
entry.def: If you say that something is endless, you mean that it is very large or lasts for a very long time, and it seems as if it will never stop.

example.ex: They turned into an endless street...
example.tran: 他们转入一条看不到尽头的街道。

sentences.sentence: "dance inspires him ceaselessly to strive higher and higher toward the shining pinnacle of perfection that is the goal of every artiste"

means.word_mean: 3. (spatial sense) seeming to have no bounds;

sentences.sentence: "the Nubian desert seemed to stretch out before them endlessly"

means.word_mean: 4. all the time; seemingly without stopping;

sentences.sentence: "a theological student with whom I argued interminably"
